This is it! We’ve kicked off #OdysseyHack, the 3rd edition of worlds biggest #Blockchain and AI #hackathon in Groningen. An epic journey where everyone discovers the future by building it.

- 1500 participants 
- 100 teams
- 11 challenging tracks
- €200K in prize money

Go go!pic.twitter.com/ImmPq6pHBv
